Name: BIOSZARD Corporation
About the game: In a near future, BIOSZARD Dev grew powerful and wealthy. The once small game development studio turned into a global scale corporation seeking to dominate, buying corrupted politicians and crazy scientists to transform humans into beasts, zombies and other unspeakable things. What could be their real goal? BIOSZARD Corporation is a 2D top-down shooter with dynamic lighting system. Many weapons such as pistol, shotgun, sniper rifle, machinegun and more. Many different enemies such as zombies, jumping beasts and hybrid aberrations 13 unique levels Unlockable characters and hidden stuff Insane boss fights Original chiptune soundtrack Adjustable difficulty Average gameplay time: 4 hours
